001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
005
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
007
008/**
009 * Implementation of a non executable {@link ApiHttpClient}
010 */
011public class SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient implements ApiHttpClient {
012    public static final String NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT = "No executable api client";
013    private final ResponseSerializer serializer;
014
015    private SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient(ResponseSerializer serializer) {
016        this.serializer = serializer;
017    }
018
019    public static SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient of() {
020        return new SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient(ResponseSerializer.of());
021    }
022
023    public static SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient of(ObjectMapper objectMapper) {
024        return new SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient(ResponseSerializer.of(objectMapper));
025    }
026
027    public static SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient of(ResponseSerializer serializer) {
028        return new SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient(serializer);
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request, Class<O> outputType) {
033        throw new IllegalStateException(NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT);
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ClientRequestCommand<O> method) {
038        throw new IllegalStateException(NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT);
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public ResponseSerializer getSerializerService() {
043        return serializer;
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
048        throw new IllegalStateException(NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT);
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    public void close() throws Exception {
053
054    }
055}
